column3: osiandɛ oetsie Me ndze na mo nkotoserɛ."
Dɛm ntsi metse ase yi mobɔbɔ ne dzin."
Na samanadze yaw too me: Muhun ahoguan na awerɛhow."

column2: "Nna mobɔɔ EWURADZE ne dzin; Ao EWURADZE

column3: san kɔ w’ahomgye mu; Na EWURADZE nye wo edzi no yie."

column2: "Na ɔwo eyi me kra efi owu mu

column3: mebɛnantsew EWURADZE enyim Wɔ atseasefo asaase do."
mpo ber a mekaa dɛ: Mo ho hiahiaa me kɛse no."
Wɔ ne yie a ɔyɛ me nyinara ntsi?"

column2: "EWURADZE n’ahotseweefo hɔn wu dze Ɔsom bo wɔ n’enyi do."

column4: w’afonabaa ne ba; Ɔwo na asan me nkyehoma."

column5: wo finimfin. Hom nyi EWURADZE ayɛw."
